text: Aalesunds Avis (The Ålesund Gazette) was a newspaper published in Ålesund, Norway from 1917 to 1958. The paper belonged to the Conservative Party.A Guide to the Foreign Press. 1917. London: War Office, p. 106.Diesen, Emil. 1921. Norske aviser og tidsskrifter med fortegnelse over norske pressefolk 1920. Kristiania, p. 19. Publication was halted by the Nazis in 1942. The paper started being published again in 1947, and it appeared weekly until 1958, when it was discontinued. ==List of editors== *Gerhard Jynge 1917–1921 *Carl Ulfsæt 1921–1924 *Sigurd Woll 1924–1925Høeg, Tom Arbo. 1974. Norske aviser: Registerbind. Oslo: Universitetsbibliotekets Hustrykkeri. *Øyvin Lange 1925–1929Petersen, K., & Birger Gotaas. 1952. Den konservative presses forening, 1892–1952. Tønsberg: Tønsbergs aktietrykkeri, pp. 76–77. *S. Stenbro Jacobsen 1929–1939 *Reidar Stavseth 1939–1940Kildal, Arne. 1945. Presse- og litteraturfronten under okkupasjonen, 1940–1945. Oslo: H. Aschehoug, p. 190.Steenstrup, Bjørn. 1979. Hvem er hvem? Oslo: Kunnskapsforlaget, p. 601. *Kjell Steinsvik 1940–1942 *Einar S. Ellefsen 1947–1958Dagspressen 24–25 (1951): 79. ==References== Category:Defunct newspapers published in Norway Category:Norwegian-language newspapers Category:Mass media in Møre og Romsdal Category:Mass media in Ålesund Category:Publications established in 1917 Category:Publications disestablished in 1958 Category:Conservative Party (Norway) newspapers
title: Aalesunds Avis
